pullrequest.title: Fix QT rendering, and rendering update rate (DEFAULT)

content.raw:
I just built the `default_fps` branch for comparison, and the FPS with no mouse movement is 28-29 in both branches. With mouse movement, this branch drops to 24-25, while `default_fps` drops to 14-15. So this is a definite improvement.

It's strange, though, that the performance is so different between OS X and Ubuntu. I'll show people tomorrow on my laptop.
content.html:
I just built the default_fps branch for comparison, and the FPS with no mouse movement is 28-29 in both branches. With mouse movement, this branch drops to 24-25, while default_fps drops to 14-15. So this is a definite improvement.

It's strange, though, that the performance is so different between OS X and Ubuntu. I'll show people tomorrow on my laptop.
